dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Inset maps: S. Shetland & S. Orkney Inseln &c. Scale 1:10,000,000 -- Süd-Georgien. Scale 1:5,000,000 -- Deception I. Scale 1:1,000,000 -- Juan Fernandez. Scale 1:1,000,000 -- Auckland In. Scale 1:2,000,000 -- Warekauri In. Scale 1:2,000,000 -- Süd-Polar-Regionen. Scale 1:170,000,000 -- Nord-Polar Regionen. Scale 1:170,000,000 -- Victoria Land. Scale 1:10,000,000 -- Neu Amsterdam & St. Paul. Scale 1:1,000,000 -- Prinz Eduard In. Scale 1:3,000,000 -- Crozet Inseln. Scale 1:3,000,000 -- Kerguelen Insel. Scale 1:2,000,000 -- Tristan da Cunha I. Scale 1:1,000,000. In upper margin: Stieler's Hand-Atlas no. 42a. From: Hand-Atlas über alle Theile der Erde nach dem neuesten Zustande und über das Weltgebäude. Gotha : J. Perthes, [1874]
